00029 MotorCommand::MotorCommand( double lC, double aC): linearConst(lC), angConst(aC) {
00030 }
00031 
00032 void MotorCommand::doProcess() {
00033         int rmp1= linearConst * this->linearVelocity;
00034         int rmp2= angConst*this->angularVelocity;
00035         if(!(MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel1, rmp1)&&MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel2, rmp2)))
00036                 this->success = false;
00037         MotorController::instance()->doProcess();
00038         this->success =  true;
00039 
00040 }

00049 void DualMotorCommand::doProcess() {
00050         WiiController * controller = WiiController::getReference();
00051         uint16_t lxaxis, lyaxis;
00052         uint16_t rxaxis, ryaxis;
00053         controller->getLeftStick( lxaxis, lyaxis );
00054         controller->getRightStick( rxaxis, ryaxis );
00055 
00056         double lspeed = ((lyaxis-32)/32.0)*1000; //need to divide by 32 because the l stick gives us 6 bits precision
00057         double rspeed = ((ryaxis-16)/16.0)*1000; //need to divide by 16 because the r stick gives us 5 bits precision
00058 
00059         LOG(DEBUG) << "lyaxis:" << lyaxis << "Lspeed " << (int)lspeed << endl;
00060         LOG(DEBUG) << "ryaxis:" << ryaxis << "Rspeed " << (int)rspeed << endl;
00061 
00062         MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel1, (int)lspeed);
00063         MotorController::instance()->setSpeed(MotorController::Channel2, (int)rspeed);
00064         MotorController::instance()->doProcess();
00065 
00066 }
